title: General Medication Advice
advice_text: Take medicines exactly as prescribed. Do not skip doses or stop early unless advised. Inform the doctor if you experience any side effects.

title: Hydration Advice
advice_text: Drink adequate fluids (2–3 liters per day unless fluid restricted). Increase fluid intake during fever, diarrhea, or hot weather.

title: Rest Advice
advice_text: Take adequate rest and avoid strenuous physical activity until recovery.

title: Follow-up Advice
advice_text: Review after the advised duration or earlier if symptoms worsen or new symptoms appear.

title: Dietary Advice (General)
advice_text: Maintain a balanced diet. Avoid outside food during illness. Prefer freshly prepared, light meals.

title: Fever Care
advice_text: Take medicines as prescribed. Maintain hydration and rest. Lukewarm sponging may be done if fever is high.

title: Antibiotic Compliance
advice_text: Complete the full course of antibiotics even if symptoms improve. Do not self-medicate or reuse leftover antibiotics.

title: Fever Warning Signs
advice_text: Seek medical attention if fever persists beyond 3 days, exceeds 102°F, or is associated with breathlessness, confusion, or severe weakness.

title: Infection Control
advice_text: Maintain personal hygiene. Wash hands frequently and avoid close contact with others if infectious symptoms are present.

title: Cough & Cold Care
advice_text: Steam inhalation twice daily. Avoid cold drinks, smoking, and exposure to dust or pollution.

title: Asthma / Wheeze Care
advice_text: Use inhaler as demonstrated. Do not skip maintenance inhalers even if symptoms improve.

title: Respiratory Red Flags
advice_text: Seek urgent care if breathing difficulty increases, chest pain occurs, lips turn bluish, or inhaler provides no relief.

title: Acidity / Gastritis Care
advice_text: Avoid spicy, oily, and acidic foods. Eat small frequent meals. Do not lie down immediately after meals.

title: Diarrhea Care
advice_text: Continue oral rehydration solution after each loose stool. Maintain hydration and light diet.

title: Vomiting Care
advice_text: Take small sips of fluids frequently. Avoid oily and spicy foods until symptoms subside.

title: GI Warning Signs
advice_text: Seek care if diarrhea or vomiting persists, blood is present in stools, or signs of dehydration appear.

title: Back Pain / Muscle Pain
advice_text: Avoid heavy lifting and sudden movements. Apply hot or cold compress as advised.

title: Joint Pain Care
advice_text: Continue gentle movements within pain limits. Avoid prolonged rest unless advised.

title: Musculoskeletal Red Flags
advice_text: Seek medical advice if pain is severe, persistent, associated with numbness, weakness, or trauma.

title: Diabetes Lifestyle Advice
advice_text: Maintain regular meals, avoid sugary foods, and monitor blood sugar as advised. Do not skip medications.

title: Hypertension Lifestyle Advice
advice_text: Reduce salt intake, avoid stress, exercise regularly, and take medicines at the same time daily.

title: Chronic Disease Follow-up
advice_text: Regular follow-up and monitoring are essential. Do not stop long-term medications without medical advice.

title: Pregnancy General Advice
advice_text: Take prescribed supplements regularly. Avoid self-medication. Attend regular antenatal check-ups.

title: Menstrual Pain Advice
advice_text: Rest, warm compress, and prescribed medications may help. Seek care if pain is severe or unusual.

title: Pediatric Fever Advice
advice_text: Give medicines as per weight-based dosing. Do not use adult medications. Ensure adequate fluids.

title: Pediatric Nutrition Advice
advice_text: Continue normal feeding during illness. Avoid force-feeding and junk food.

title: Pediatric Red Flags
advice_text: Seek immediate care if child is lethargic, not feeding, has fast breathing, or persistent vomiting.

title: Lifestyle Modification
advice_text: Avoid smoking, alcohol, and tobacco. Maintain regular sleep and physical activity.

title: Weight Management Advice
advice_text: Adopt a balanced diet and regular exercise. Avoid crash diets.

title: Preventive Care Advice
advice_text: Regular health check-ups help early detection and prevention of disease.

title: Return Immediately Advice
advice_text: Return immediately if symptoms worsen, new symptoms develop, or no improvement is seen as expected.

title: Emergency Symptoms Advice
advice_text: Seek emergency care for chest pain, sudden breathlessness, loss of consciousness, severe bleeding, or seizures.
